Package org.opentcs.access.rmi

Interfaces and classes for transparently providing an openTCS kernel's functionality via RMI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KernelProxy
    A proxy for a Kernel instance that hides the details of communication with a remote kernel, so a client can call methods of the proxy as if it was a reference to a kernel instance within the same JVM.
    RemoteKernel
    Declares the methods provided by an openTCS kernel via RMI.
    RemoteKernelConnection
    Provides methods for logging into and out of a remote kernel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientID
    Identifies a remote client unambiguously.
    DynamicRemoteKernelProxy Deprecated
    Use KernelProxyBuilder instead.
    KernelProxyBuilder
    Builds KernelProxy instances for connections to remote kernels.
    TCSProxyStateEvent
    Instances of this class represent events emitted by/for kernel proxy state changes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemoteKernelConnection.State
    Defines the states in which a KernelProxy instance may be in.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KernelUnavailableException
    Thrown when a kernel is not available for processing a request.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CallPermissions
    Indicates which permissions a client needs to have to be allowed to call an annotated method.

Package org.opentcs.access.rmi Description

Interfaces and classes for transparently providing an openTCS kernel's functionality via RMI.
